channel.title: How to change starter gear when new player logs on
channel.description: How do i change the gear for new players when they log on? i dont want them wearing anything.

item.title: How to change starter gear when new player logs on
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“emtscape, post:5, topic:366526”]Ok, what i mean is, ok i got some of the gear for them when they log on but, what about the ones i leave empty like the hat, arrows and shield? what code would i put there so its not another item or compiling error[/quote]Your first post made more sense then what you just said.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change starter gear when new player logs on

item.title: How to change starter gear when new player logs on
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Be specific.

  1. Don’t even make a starter command. Make new players get the items in inven when they first start off
  2. If they are wearing stuff, tell us what they are wearing in ID’s.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change starter gear when new player logs on

item.title: How to change starter gear when new player logs on
item.dc:creator: @emtscape emtscape
item.description:
@emtscape wrote:

I dont want them to be wearing anything, but im making a ::starter command, so what do i replace the previous items they wearing? so its not another item

Read full topic
item.source: How to change starter gear when new player logs on

item.title: How to change starter gear when new player logs on
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

We need more information, assuming this is a 317.

Player.java, search for what they’re currently wearing and change it (ITEMID), also the starter should be in client.java. Search for the ITEMIDs off the starter items and change them to the ones you want.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change starter gear when new player logs on
